name: Mallow Slayer
description:
A boomer shooter combined with marshmallows makes  Mallow Slayer. In Mallow Slayer you are challenged to destroy any marshmallow that gets in your way. 

Enjoy non-stop action and gameplay without interruptions. the game was designed to be a chill fps were you shoot and move fast. It doesn't involve any complex mechanics or any interaction with the environment.

By the way there is a campaign mode coming up soon so stay tuned for that
